name: Light and Sound
description:
Journey into a cave full of darkness and silence, uncover its eerie secrets.

Light and Sound is my first officially released independent project! This is just a text-based Twine short. It was really fun to write and I think it showcases some of my fun writing.

If you enjoy Light and Sound please let me know and follow me here or on Twitter (michelle_does) for my future projects. I promise they'll be much prettier and more elaborate!
